--- select_literals_all.sql
SELECT
  "abc",
  "it's",
  'it\'s',
  'Title: "Boy"',
  """abc""",
  '''it's''',
  '''Title:"Boy"''',
  '''two
lines''',
  '''why\?''',
  R"abc+",
  r'''abc+''',
  R"""abc+""",
  r'f\(abc,(.*),def\)',
  B"abc",
  B'''abc''',
  b"""abc""",
  br'abc+',
  RB"abc+",
  RB'''abc''',
  123,
  0xABC,
  -123,
  -0xABC,
  123.456e-67,
  .1E4,
  58.,
  4e2,
  [1, 2, 3],
  ['x', 'y', 'xy'],
  ARRAY[1, 2, 3],
  ARRAY<string>['x', 'y', 'xy'],
  ARRAY<int64>[],
  ARRAY(SELECT STRUCT(1, 2, 3)),
  ARRAY(SELECT (1, 2, 3)),
  DATE '2014-09-27',
  DATE('2014-09-27'),
  TIMESTAMP '2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08',
  TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles",
  TIMESTAMP'2014-09-27',
  TIMESTAMP('2014-09-27')

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
          pos:   9,
          end:   14,
          Value: "abc",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
          pos:   18,
          end:   24,
          Value: "it's",
        },

          pos:   28,
          end:   35,
          Value: "it's",
        },

          pos:   39,
          end:   53,

        },
      },

          pos:   57,
          end:   66,
          Value: "abc",
        },
      },

          pos:   70,

          pos:   124,

        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:    352,

              pos:   353,

              pos:   366,

              Value: "x",

          pos:    385,

            pos:  409,

          Values: []parser.Expr{
            &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   417,
              end:   420,
              Value: "x",

              pos:   422,

      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArrayLiteral{
          pos:  436,
          end:  450,
          Type: &parser.SimpleType{
            pos:  442,
            Name: "INT64",
          },
          Values: []parser.Expr{},
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.ArraySubQuery{
          pos:   454,
          end:   483,
          Query: &parser.Select{
            pos:      460,
            Distinct: false,
            AsStruct: false,
            Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
              &parser.ExprSelectItem{
                Expr: &parser.StructLiteral{
                  pos:    467,
                  end:    482,
                  Fields: []*parser.FieldType{},
                  Values: []parser.Expr{
                    &parser.IntLiteral{
                      pos:   474,
                      end:   475,
                      Base:  10,
                      Value: "1",

          pos:   487,

            pos:      493,

        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  553,

            pos:  535,
            end:  539,
            Name: "DATE",

          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  540,
              Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
                pos:   540,
                end:   552,
                Value: "2014-09-27",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },

      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   557,

        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   598,

      },

        Expr: &parser.TimestampLiteral{
          pos:   656,
          end:   677,
          Value: "2014-09-27",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.CallExpr{
          end:  704,
          Func: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  681,
            end:  690,
            Name: "TIMESTAMP",
          },
          Distinct: false,
          Args:     []*parser.Arg{
            &parser.Arg{
              pos:  691,
              Expr: &parser.StringLiteral{
                pos:   691,
                end:   703,
                Value: "2014-09-27",
              },
              IntervalUnit: (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From:    (*parser.From)(nil),
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT "abc", "it\'s", "it\'s", "Title: \"Boy\"", "abc", "it\'s", "Title:\"Boy\"", "two\nlines", "why\?", "abc+", "abc+", "abc+", "f\\(abc,(.*),def\\)", B"abc", B"abc", B"abc", B"abc+", B"abc+", B"abc", 123, 0xABC, -123, -0xABC, 123.456e-67, .1E4, 58., 4e2, ARRAY[1, 2, 3], ARRAY["x", "y", "xy"], ARRAY[1, 2, 3], ARRAY<STRING>["x", "y", "xy"], ARRAY<INT64>[], ARRAY(SELECT STRUCT(1, 2, 3)), ARRAY(SELECT STRUCT(1, 2, 3)), DATE "2014-09-27", DATE("2014-09-27"), TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45-08", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27 12:30:00.45 America/Los_Angeles", TIMESTAMP "2014-09-27", TIMESTAMP("2014-09-27")
